definition: day and night/period of 24 hours/continuously, without stop

sentences.english: Someone is on duty here around-the-clock .
Fifty human years are equal to one day & night among the Devas of the Four Great Kings.
sentences.chinese: 人间五十年，是四大王天天神的一昼夜。

sentences.english: It passes on just like this, not ceasing day or night!
I think about you day and night.
Your teachings urge me to the wind and rain, my heart till blessings with you day and night.
sentences.chinese: 您的教诲催我风雨兼程，我的祝福伴您昼夜心耕。

sentences.english: which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day" (Luke 2:36-37)
sentences.chinese: 并不离开圣殿，禁食祈求，昼夜事奉神。

sentences.english: In a night, or in a day.
The environmental light-dark cycle acts as one of the most potent influencing agents of circadian system.
sentences.chinese: 光照周期是影响昼夜节律系统的主要环境因子。

sentences.english: Good programmers think about their work 24/7.
sentences.chinese: 好的程序员不分昼夜在思考完善自己的项目。

sentences.english: In principle a volcano can erupt at any time, day and night.
sentences.chinese: 原则上说，火山随时都会爆发，不分昼夜。

sentences.english: Circadian rhythms show persistent, stable periodicities of about 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 昼夜节律表现出大约24小时的连续而稳定的周期性。

sentences.english: If life lasted but a day I would emit all my fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 如果生命只有短暂的一昼夜，我要尽情吐露芬芳。

sentences.english: HanShan sitting under the cliff edge, night and day, JuShou river.
sentences.chinese: 韩珊坐在山崖下的河水边，昼夜据守。

sentences.english: This gene is critical to circadian rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 这种基因因其昼夜节律而显得至为重要。

sentences.english: The moths fly with a clear day-night rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 飞翔活动有明显的昼夜节律。

sentences.english: It was a small and shabby all-night café.
sentences.chinese: 这是一间昼夜营业的破破烂烂的小咖啡馆。

definition: night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
the whole night/all through the night
day after day/for several days running
to travel at double speed/to make all haste
the four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
to travel or work through night and day/to toil away for long hours
to go and come back/to make a return trip/backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action)/to reciprocate (of machine part)
